thread.title: Dolphins Cancer Challenge Fall Family Fest
thread.title_full: Dolphins Cancer Challenge Fall Family Fest

title: Dolphins Cancer Challenge Fall Family Fest
text:
Dolphins Cancer Challenge Fall Family Fest Where 
101 NE Third Avenue Suite 1500 Fort Lauderdale, FL 33301 
11:00 a.m. Sunday, Nov. 8, 2015 Categories 
Events, Fundraisers, Kids | Family The DCC believes kids want to fight cancer too! With the all new Fall Family Fest, kids are the fundraisers, tackling cancer just like their parents. The DCC will host two Fall Family Fests in November so kids have the opportunity to raise money for Sylvester – we know the power kids can have to tackle cancer! November 8th – Holiday Park in Fort Lauderdale November 15th – University of Miami Coral Gables campus Kids ages 3-16 will be able to participate in a kids ride in a car-free, safe location with their families – from short loops up to 10 miles! Each event will have activities for the whole family, including: A kids zone with bouncy houses and other inflatables Face painting Animal exhibit Dolphins Youth Programs activities Food trucks Big screens to watch the Dolphins away game Adult beer garden Timeline: 10:00AM Registration/Check-In Opens 11:00AM Ride Begins, Kids Zone Opens 1:00PM Ride Loop Shuts Down/ Dolphins Game Kick-off 4:00PM (approximately) Fall Family Fest ends In addition, Sylvester will showcase what they do in a kid-friendly way. There is a $15 registration fee and a suggested fundraising of $100/per child to participate. Fall Family Fest participants (the registered child) and one parent/guardian will receive a free ticket to the DCC VI finish line concert featuring Grammy-Award winners Sheryl Crow and Melissa Etheridge on Feb. 20, 2016 at Sun Life Stadium. REGISTER: http://dolphinscancerchallenge.com/fall-family-fest
